sentences.en: For fuel cell is used as the DC power of inverter, a voltage pumping circuit for releasing nimiety regenerative energy was researched.
sentences.cn: 针对燃料电池供电的伺服电机，研究了一种用来释放多余回馈能量的电压泵升电路。

sentences.en: I'll take her in black any day. Finally, I discovered a whole other level of luxury – or, shall we say, nimiety.
sentences.cn: 我会全天都开着黑色的这款车。最后，我发现了全新的奢华级轿车– 或者应该说是过度的奢华–。
